name: Mini Chocolate Pies
totalTime: 1 hr and 20 min (includes 1 hour chill time)
preparation:
1. Prepare the crust. In a bowl, combine graham cracker crumbs and milk.
  2. Place Muffin Maker (set of 2) on two 1⁄4 Sheet Pans. Divide mixture between 12 wells. Push down firmly. Set aside.
  3. In Multipurpose Pot, whisk mix with coconut milk. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat, stirring frequently. Immediately remove from heat. Whisk in yogurt.
  4. Pour filling into each well—you will have filling leftover, don’t overfill! Refrigerate 1 hr until set.  Top with yogurt or berries, as desired.
tips: Pour leftover filling into a Prep Bowl and refrigerate until set for a sweet treat!
